page.title: 13HAWKESLEY TRADES
page.content: There are different forms of trade such as {shops}.There are eight different shops altogether.There is the{pub} that sells alcohol and soft drinks such as pop and there is the {chip shop} which sells chips,fish,pies,pickled onions and there is the {off licence} which sells sweets,crisps,alcohol and other things as well.There is a {hair- dresser} as well with men and women that cut and style hair .{The hardware} comes next.It sells wool, electrical appliances,ornaments.There is the{ sup- ermarket} next that sells food and clothes,sweets,video,cakes and other things as well.{Preedys} comes next.It sells sweets,cards,wrapping paper and there is a {post office} in there as well. Last of all the{chemist} which sells body spray,grips,earings,tights and other things to. By Sally Wyton Hawkesley C/E Junior School.
